subject: [Radiance-general] New images and Benchmark updates
body:
He Mark,

Thanks for sharing such nice art to the Radiance community.
As Chas, I am curious to hear some more information. What is inspiring
you to make these images ?
Really nice work!!! Really Radiance to me too!

Iebele
